menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Fresh romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing.

menuItems.name: Garden Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens with cucumber, cherry tomatoes, bell peppers, and balsamic vinaigrette.

menuItems.name: Sautéed Mushrooms
menuItems.description: Mushrooms sautéed with garlic, butter, and fresh herbs.

menuItems.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken, red onions, cilantro, and BBQ sauce on a crispy crust.

menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and olive oil.

menuItems.name: Beef Burger
menuItems.description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce on a brioche bun.
